about_the_game:
Your father's new girlfriend Emma and her three daughters Emily, 19, Amy, 23, and Isabella, 25, have recently moved into your house. You've just been given your vacation from your job because it's summer. Your goal is to get your three stepsisters and stepmother to fall in love with you so you can have sex with them since you are a sex addict.

But you will have limited time for this as you will have to achieve it in the 10 days you have of vacation. At the end of your vacation depending on how many girls you have managed to have sex with you will have a score on the flirt scale. Talk to them, answer their questions correctly, flirt, help them with whatever they need or insult them if necessary in order to achieve your goal.

Enjoy an adventure in which you will visit different places and you will be able to explore them while you demonstrate your ability to flirt with girls.

Your decisions matter, use your intellect to respond to each girl in the right way to win them over. Things will get complicated since you are a family and they are your stepsisters and stepmother. Your father might find out and he won't be happy.

content_descriptors.notes: In this game you can pick up girls and make them fall in love and then have sex with them. With each girl you will see a different sex scene. Sexual content are videos created with stylized 3D models and animations. Each girl has her own pose and video that you have to unlock.incest.

Talk to them, answer their questions correctly, flirt, help them with whatever they need or insult them if necessary in order to achieve your goal.

Enjoy an adventure in which you will visit different places and you will be able to explore them while you demonstrate your ability to flirt with girls.

Your decisions matter, use your intellect to respond to each girl in the right way to win them over. Things will get complicated since you are a family and they are your stepsisters and stepmother. Your father might find out and he won't be happy.
name: Family tabu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
